title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1725-1.5 - Certificate of incorporation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1725-1.5 - Certificate of incorporation

State Regulations

Members of the board of directors cannot exceed the
authority granted in the certificate of incorporation, nor can they perform
acts other than those expressed or implied in such
certificate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1725-1.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
